description: This file contains the schema and mapping definitions for a campus scheduling project, including data structures stored in local storage and their relationships to external database tables in a PostgreSQL database. It defines data models for courses, rooms, faculty, schedules, and related entities, as well as mappings between local storage representations and database schemas.
external_files: postgresql database schema definitions and migrations
external_methods: methods to retrieve, store, and synchronize data between local storage and backend
database access functions for CRUD operations
